capability.name: Open Item Management
capability.definition: This service domain provides a service for handling the resolution of open items against accounts (such as overdue loan payments)
capability.role: This service domain handles open item processing against accounts typically for loans. It enables a unit to handle resolution across multiple accounts as a specialized/centralized administrative activity
capability.example: Open items are cleared against an active loan facility

key_features.name: Register and classify open items for processing
key_features.description: Enables register and classify open items for processing to support this service domain provides a service for handling the resolution of open items against accounts (such as overdue loan payments)

key_features.name: Process/resolve open items
key_features.description: Enables process/resolve open items to support this service domain provides a service for handling the resolution of open items against accounts (such as overdue loan payments)

key_features.name: Report on open item resolution activity
key_features.description: Enables report on open item resolution activity to support this service domain provides a service for handling the resolution of open items against accounts (such as overdue loan payments)
